name: e2b
description: Developer-first AgentOps platform - deploy, test, and monitor AI agents

scripts.dev-otel: npx concurrently -p none "next dev" "npm run start:api-otel" "npm run start:playground"
scripts.dev: OTEL_SDK_DISABLED="true" npx concurrently -p none "next dev" "npm run start:api" "npm run start:playground"
scripts.dev:api-service: npx concurrently "npm run start:api" "npm run start:playground"
scripts.start:api-otel: cd api-service && cross-env PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 OTEL_METRIC_EXPORT_INTERVAL=15000 OBJC_DISABLE_INITIALIZE_FORK_SAFETY=YES poetry run opentelemetry-instrument --service_name agent-api --exporter_otlp_endpoint "ingest.lightstep.com:443" --traces_exporter console,otlp_proto_grpc --metrics_exporter console,otlp_proto_grpc gunicorn --bind 0.0.0.0:49155 --workers 1 --threads 2 --timeout 120 app:app -k uvicorn.workers.UvicornWorker
scripts.start:api: cd api-service && cross-env PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 poetry run uvicorn app:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 49155
scripts.install:api-service: cd api-service && poetry install --with dev --no-root && cd playground && npm install && poetry run opentelemetry-bootstrap -a install
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:api-service && npm run install:api-playground
scripts.start: docker compose build && (npm run db:reset || cd . && npm run db:start && docker compose up)
scripts.stop: docker compose down && npm run db:stop
scripts.supabase:generate: npx --yes supabase@1.46.5 gen types typescript --project-id "ntjfcwpzsxugrykskdgi" --schema public > db/supabase.ts
